name: Polymega Collection Vol. 2: Karate Champ
description:
Revisit the origin of one of gaming's most popular genre's with DATA EAST'S KARATE CHAMP, the first one-on-one fighting video game.

Released in 1984, Karate Champ quickly became a worldwide arcade hit, gaining the attention of a growing video games industry with its innovative dual-joystick control scheme and unique emphasis placed on precision movements and timing.

This collection of classic 2D fighting games features the pioneering KARATE CHAMP arcade game, alongside it's action packed spiritual successors FIGHTER'S HISTORY and FIGHTER'S HISTORY DYNAMITE/KARNOV'S REVENGE. This Double Disc Polymega Collection release also includes a bonus disc version of Fighter's History Dynamite compatible with Polymega as well as the original Neo CD system.

name: 3D Morpion
description:
A Connect 4 in 3 dimensions but without the effect of gravity.
In a four-story cube, "align yourself" against the malice of your machine.
In a four-level cube, try to align four pawns along the diagonals, vertical and horizontal.

name: Super Metroid Eleven
description: Super Metroid Eleven is a ROM hack of Super Metroid created by Metaquarius for the 2024 Metroid Construction Star Base Contest. The game challenges players to infiltrate a star base, steal 14 fuel tanks, and escape.Designed for veteran players, it incorporates advanced mechanics from Project Base 0.8.1, and adds a few interesting twists to the standard Metroid Formula.

name: Nauticell
description: Sin descripción

name: Newsun
description:
Newsun is a short Disco Elysium inspired project for a Programming Languages college course Final Project.

The nameless amnesiac Protagonist experiences a day Newsun Hotel, a weirdly familiar 5-story establishment.

name: Pocket Hockey
description: Pocket Hockey brings the excitement of competitive ice hockey to your mobile device. This PvP game focuses on real-time matches where players can test their skills and strive to climb the ranks. Featuring customizable teams with unique characters, the game offers fast-paced gameplay designed to deliver an engaging hockey experience anytime, anywhere.

name: Roam
description: ROAM is a silly sandbox game where you play as a wild horse! Customize your horse and five members of your herd and explore the open world! Reunite and take care of your herd! Breed your horses to welcome new foals! Choose to cause havoc in the local towns! However you play, roam free!

name: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II
description: Exclusive features of the Wii version includes in exclusive “force rage” power, an exclusive for weight power, a multiplayer mode inspired by Outfoxies, and an extra-story based level.

name: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II
description: The DS version was designed for shorter play sessions due to it’s mobile nature.

name: Nedy's Adventure: The Curse of Vera Deluxe
description: The Carbon captain has kidnapped you to have someone to resolve the cursed island mistery, she makes you jump from the airplane with your parachute, and then you must guide Nedy to escape from the island. You'll get into trouble and it won't be easy to escape...

name: Poké Floats: Melee
description: Stage mod for Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.

name: Pokemon Find The Alphabets
description: Use your mouse to interact and find all the hidden letters of the alphabet. Be careful, you have to help Pikachu and his friends before the time runs out, so have to work fast, and you have to be precise, each wrong click costs you points.

name: Tic Tactic
description: Long ago, the feathered nations lived in harmony. But, nothing lasts forever. Avenge the ducks in this deckbuilding roguelike take on tic-tac-toe. Collect tiles, engage in strategic battles, meet quirky characters, and explore diverse environments as you push ever closer to the chicken stronghold.

name: Restaurant Owner: A Restaurant Simulator
description: Step into the world of a Restaurateur in Restaurant Owner: Prologue, where you create unique recipes, manage your restaurant, and satisfy customers. Unlock ingredients, design your menu, and start your journey toward becoming a top Restaurant Manager. Your culinary adventure begins here!

name: Aris Arcanum
description: Clyde Colergrave is a Librarian, laboring away in the Aris Archives. Bound by his Knowledge, he is trapped with the festering Ink among the occult stacks of Aris. A unique Victorian roguelite awaits, where a desperate scholar uses Atramancy, the Magic of Ink, to spellcraft his way to salvation...

name: WWF Raw
description: The Game Boy version runs much slower then it’s home console counterpart, and there are certain wrestlers and modes not featured.

name: WWF Raw
description: Exclusive to the game gear version are "Macho Man" Randy Savage and Crush.

name: Survev.io
description: Survev.io Battle Royale is a thrilling multiplayer game where you fight to be the last character standing on a shrinking island. Start with nothing but your fists, scavenge for weapons and supplies, and stay within the safe zone. Choose between solo, duo, or squad modes, and use strategy and skills to outlast up to 50 opponents.

name: Halo: Combat Evolved VR
description: A virtual reality conversion mod for the original PC version of Halo: Combat Evolved.

name: Sparta Anthology
description: The Sparta Anthology is a collection that includes the games Ancient Wars: Sparta and Age of Alexander.

name: Zen Pinball World
description: Zen Pinball World brings you the latest and greatest pinball tables to mobile! Dive into the next evolution of pinball mastery from Zen Studios, inspired by the biggest entertainment brands.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Ice Rink - Winter 2024
description: Put all your plans on ice, this is no rinky-dink clean up. With the grand reopening of the Ice Rink just around the corner, and the place nothing short of a glacial grime-fest, you’re the power washer wielding hero Muckingham needs this holiday season.

name: Nighthold
description: Build shelters, interact with rescuees, battle against the Rot and raiders to survive another night in this Sandbox RPG. Play Solo or team up with friends in Online Сo-op.

name: Craftlings
description: Welcome to Craftlings, a humorous, relaxing resource-management strategy game, set in a vibrant fantasy world where you guide hapless creatures to build settlements, automate production chains, then mobilize them to protect their homes.

name: Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault
description: Live the double life of a fearless adventurer and a crafty merchant! Dive into vibrant dimensions brimming with shiny loot and pesky enemies. Grow your shop, tinker with weapons and gadgets, as well as make your mark among a ragtag community of castaways.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Tactical Takedown
description: Splinter and Shredder are dead. Help the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles tackle deadly new threats and the approach of adulthood in this fast-paced turn-based beat-em-up.

name: Sol Mates
description: Steer, shield, and blast your way through space in this chaotic co-op party game. You and your ragtag crew will take on missions, make quick decisions, and work together to make a name for yourself in the vast expanse of the universe.

name: Starlight Re:Volver
description: Dive into vibrant dream worlds, where every adventure brings you closer to Nishi stardom. Team up to unleash explosive combos and defeat powerful foes. Then, unwind in the lively city of NIM, where you can hang-out, craft and relax with friends.

name: SpaceCraft
description: The Universe is yours. SpaceCraft is an online space exploration and building game. Explore a vast galaxy of solar systems and planets, mine and craft resources, design and build ships, automate planetary bases and interplanetary logistics, trade and cooperate.

name: Tombwater
description: Explore the accursed Wild West town of Tombwater and lay bare the eldritch horrors that lie beneath. Survive blood-spilling combat in this gruesome 2D action-RPG that might just drive you to madness.

name: Prologue: Go Wayback!
description: Prologue: Go Wayback! is a single-player open-world emergent game within the survival genre. With classic survival mechanics and machine learning-driven terrain generation resulting in millions of possible maps, it challenges the players to explore their limits.

name: Preface: Undiscovered World
description: Preface is an immersive tech demo showcasing Melba, PLAYERUNKNOWN Productions' groundbreaking technology generating an Earth-scale world. In this project still in development, experience our machine learning agents creating a planet in real-time, directly on your GPU.

name: The Outlast Trials: Project Breach
description: Sin descripción

name: Deepest Fear
description: Sin descripción

name: Ready or Not: Dark Waters
description: At approx. 0800 hours this morning a critical situation occurred on offshore oil rig “HeavyWell A-101" and was responded to via tactical response by LSPD SWAT. The “United Peoples Front,” designated by the US Government as a terror group, claimed responsibility for this hostage incident. The situation is still ongoing, further investigation and situation reports are under the jurisdiction of FISA.

name: Chains of Freedom
description: Embark on a thrilling journey in a high-stakes, turn-based tactics game. Lead an elite squad in a fictional, dystopian Eastern Europe as you unravel a sinister conspiracy threatening the nation. Navigate intense strategic battles and adapt to ever-evolving challenges to prevail.

name: Geometry Blaster
description: Geometry Blaster is a Blaster game that teaches high school geometry.

name: City Tales: Medieval Era
description: Build medieval cities teeming with life and tales untold. Forge organic urban landscapes and manage a rich economy whilst building bonds with companions whose stories are intertwined with the fate of your city.

name: Reach for the Stars
description:
The year is 3024.

While journeying home from a dangerous mission, a critical malfunction has crippled your rocket and stranded you on a strange planet several lightyears away from Earth.

Your only recourse is to use your grapple gun to travel to the orbiting planets and find a way harness their celestial energy. Only then will you be able to restore power to your ship and return home.

name: Drivers of the Apocalypse
description: Drivers of the Apocalypse is a high-octane action-driving combat game set in a vast, treacherous wasteland. You step into the shoes of Artemis, a junior mercenary working for Thunder Strike Force. Your mission? Stop deadly convoys, defeat powerful bosses, and survive.

name: The Finals: Season 5 - Next Stage
description:
Season 5 is the current and the fifth season of THE FINALS. It launched on December 12, 2024, and is expected to end on March 20, 2025.

This season is sponsored by VAIIYA, DISSUN and the returning sponsor ISEUL-T, who introduced the all-new arena Bernal.

New content introduced in Season 5 includes:
- Arena: Bernal
- New cosmetics
- New Battle Pass
- Weapons: Cerberus 12GA, ShAK-50
- Gadgets: Gravity Vortex, Lockbolt Launcher
- New weapon sights
- Clubs
- Progression: new sponsorships, new career levels

name: Empyreal
description: Empyreal is a complex, challenging, feature-rich action RPG. In a far-flung corner of the galaxy an Expedition arrives on a hitherto unexplored planet to find a colossal Monolith built by a lost civilisation.

name: Legends of Awen: Rise of The Fianna
description: Legends of Awen: Rise of the Fianna is a story-driven cRPG set in a Celtic-inspired medieval-fantasy world. Gather your party of legendary Fianna champions and embark on a journey to save the kingdom of Tara from internal strife and the return of an ancient dark force!

name: CandyCraft
description: You want to have a journey to a peaceful and sweet country ? Too bad, if you want Candylands to be peaceful, you will have to be strong and defeat all those dangerous creatures. Explore many biomes, tame pets and dragons, fight monsters and bosses, trade with the gingerbreads villagers and travel throught massive dungeons

name: Containment Corp, Inc.
description: A co-op horror game where you team up with friends to hunt anomalies and collect rare loot. Customize your loadouts, your looks, much more!

name: Spyro: Enter the Dragonfly - Definitive Edition
description: This mod fixes hundreds upon hundreds of bugs, restores many pieces of unused and even cut content, and adds key quality-of-life improvements to make the experience better than ever.

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster: Special Edition
description:
Say cheese! Everyone’s favorite zombie-hunting photojournalist, Frank West, is back in action with the beautifully remastered Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster. Reanimated from the ground up with Capcom’s RE ENGINE, Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster is the definitive remaster of the 2006 classic Dead Rising, which delivered a fresh take on the zombie genre with incredible action, over-the-top combat, hordes of weapon choices, wacky costumes (trust us, they’re even wackier this time around), and a comedic yet compelling storyline

Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster introduces freelance photojournalist Frank West as he ventures to Willamette, Colorado after overhearing there is something going on in town. Frank soon finds out he is in the middle of a zombie takeover and has 72 hours to uncover the truth about this outbreak!

name: Detective Beebo: Night at the Mansion
description: Detective Beebo is a Point-and-click mystery romcom with puzzle elements.

name: Evil Nun: The Broken Mask - Unholy Edition
description:
Includes Special Slip Cover, Digital Soundtrack, Camp Admission Letter, Art book and PS5 Game.
Enter Evil Nun's nightmare: trapped in a cursed school, escape from Sister Madeline.

She is cunning, searching every corner, luring you in and talking to you according to your actions.

Solve puzzles, craft items, and uncover the mystery in this horror game with different escape routes.

Based on the hit mobile game series with over 60M downloads, Evil Nun: The Broken Mask recaptures the essence of the original with improved graphics, new maps and a new storyline.

A combination of survival horror and hide-and-seek set in an immersive atmosphere.

name: MyRobot
description:
Adventure Character Simulator with optional AI features featuring your own robot that you can build and explore with.

Developed by sgthale, StillKill, and algernonvanpeel

name: Lex Venture: A Crossword Caper
description: Bullies have stolen and hidden parts of Eugene`s amazing Letter Machine--right before the science fair! Can you connect enough words crossword-style to build a path and collect the missing parts in time? With dozens of colorful levels to explore and obstacles to avoid, Lex Venture provides hours of fun for one person or the whole family. Outsmart the bullies and save the science fair!

name: Papetura: Craft Edition
description:
One day Pape escapes from a flowery prison and finds little Tura, a magical being that he’ll take care of. Together they will have to face dark and flaming monsters which will try to burn down their beloved paper world.

Papetura is a handcrafted puzzle adventure game made entirely out of paper.

Along with atmospheric music made by Floex, Tomas Dvorak, it creates a mysterious and unique paper world shrouded in shadow and light.

Everything is made out of paper, from tiny insects, strange creatures and monsters to truly magical locations.

Includes Exclusive Case, Downloadable Soundtrack, Art book and Base Game.

name: Ore-tachi Gesen-zoku
description: Ore-tachi Gesen-zoku is a series of 19 emulated arcade machine game titles from the 80s and 90s for PlayStation 2 published by Hamster and only available in Japan.[2] Of the 19 games, the last two – Thunder Cross (1988) and Trio the Punch (1990) – were previously never released on home platforms.

name: Runner Heroes: The Curse of Night and Day - Enhanced Edition
description: Runner Heroes is a unique adventure in which you control two characters at the same time. Sprint your way through the mystical lands of Celuria, a war-torn land of magic, to break a wicked curse and reunite with your childhood sweetheart. Do you accept the challenge? Follow Colwyn and Lyssa, heirs of their respective kingdoms, as an evil Red Witch prevents their love from flourishing. Harness the magic of Celuria to fight her curse as she chases you across 5 challenging worlds! Escape her clutches by running, jumping, diving and riding mine cars across 47 levels.

name: Goldenheart
description: Goldenheart is a retro first person fantasy adventure game created by two people in our home studio. It has a look and feel inspired by our favorite classic console games.

name: Sociable Soccer 25
description: Embrace the excitement of the world's favorite sport in Sociable Soccer 25. Created by legendary game designer Jon Hare, Sociable Soccer 25 features his signature fast-paced, arcade-style and intuitive gameplay, enriched with multiplayer head-to-head matches and collectible player cards.

name: Anno 1800: End of an Era Pack
description: Celebrate the grand finale of Anno 1800 with the End of an Era pack! Transform your cities into the ultimate celebration space with over 27 festive new ornaments and skins! This pack marks the last cosmetic DLC and game update for the game.

name: Tomb Raider I•II•III Remastered: Deluxe Edition
description:
For the first time ever, play the complete experience with all expansions and secret levels on modern platforms in this definitive collection.
Deluxe Steelbook Edition includes
• Physical copy of Tomb Raider I-III Remastered Starring Lara Croft
• SteelBook
• Exploration map book (featuring over 80 pages full of secrets, including all maps from all three games and their expansions)
• Collectible tuck-in box
• The collection's original soundtrack

name: Sniper Elite: Resistance - Deluxe Edition
description:
2-Day Early Unlock
1 Weapon Skin
Karabiner 98 Rifle
M1911 Pistol
Target Führer Campaign Mission (2-Day Early Unlock)
Season Pass

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Sew Delightful
description: The 14th free update for Disney Dreamlight Valley brings 'Sally from Disney Tim Burton’s The Nightmare Before Christmas as a new character, new Floating Islands to decorate and the Frost & Fairies Star Path.

name: Rivals Hover League
description: 'Rivals Hover League' is a vehicular combat PvP game where players battle in arenas across the galaxy using hover vehicles with various abilities. Join your teammates and show off your skills - hover, boost, shoot your way to become the MVP!

name: Juufuutei Raden's Guide for Pixel Museum
description: A VTuber from hololive DEV_IS, "Juufuutei Raden" from ReGLOSS, will guide you through a museum as the curator. The entire game world, including Curator Raden and the museum, is depicted in "pixel art". The illustrations are completed by solving logic nonogram puzzles.

name: TrickShot Simulator
description:
This Game is a simulator game.
A player experiences realistic trickshot challenges.

name: Santa Slides to Town
description: Santa Claus slides on his sleigh. Jump or double-jump or even triple-jump over obstacles. Gather stars to unlock new levels and upgrades. Reach the town as quickly as possible to set a new record. Use your collected stars to personalize the game's appearance.

name: Mystical Maritime Adventure
description: Here, you can freely sail your ship, explore the endless ocean, and find hidden islands and treasures!

name: Rugby League Team Manager 4
description: The fourth instalment of “The Number 1 Rugby League Management Game”. The biggest leagues and competitions. Take full control of managing your own Rugby League club. Training schedules, coaches, physios, scouting, finances, sponsors and more. MUCH MORE!

name: Purrfect Frenzy
description: A fast-paced top-down survival shooter where a cat fights off waves of rats in a brutal gladiatorial arena. Survive dynamic stages with evolving challenges and uncover hidden secrets behind the rat hordes.

name: Druta-Cinta
description: Sin descripción

name: The Bewildering Basilica of the Bishop of Bobtown
description: A deckbuilding, tactical roguelike focusing on controlling the battlefield and getting your units close enough to the enemy commander to kill them while defending your own leaders. Summon units and wield skills to protect them to defeat your foes!

name: Scauage
description: A short horror experience where you play as a scavenger looting an abandoned house, uncovering its dark secrets and collecting hidden treasures while facing what lurks within.

name: Chosen Card Chronicles
description: Chosen Card Chronicles is a fast-paced card-battling visual novel with over 900 cards to collect. Meet new friends, build the ultimate deck, and aim for the top of the world.

name: Hello Nikki: Let's Beauty Up
description: Hello Nikki-Let's Beauty Up is a mobile game developed by Paper Studio. It is the second game in the Nikki Up2U series.

name: NES Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Party Spirits
description: An online party game for 2-6 players. Play with friends or by matchmaking. Experience unique physics-based minigames. Use your spirit form after death to sabotage others and turn the tide in your favor.

name: Fisher-Price: Time To Play - Dollhouse
description: This software designed for younger girls provides a virtual dollhouse full of activities to encourage role-playing, exploration, and imagination. Players search eight different areas for hidden surprises and play with four interactive dolls at special tea parties.

name: NLC 7: Hard Edition
description: Explore a meticulously crafted world where your decisions have consequences, and quests offer multiple completion paths. Success requires strategic planning and adaptability. Attention to detail is critical. Observe dialogues, environments, and ever-present dangers closely.

name: Menticide
description: Sin descripción

name: Oblivion Lost Remake: Vector of Alienation
description: The main feature of this modification is the professional interpretation of build stalker's storyline - turning the game into a true intellectual science fiction thriller with a deep and detailed core scenario and a lot of secondary twists and turns. Restoration of the plot content was based on many design documents of Oblivion Lost and attempted creating a cumulative, organic plot by combining the most interesting ideas of the project's changing storyline over different years

name: Night Store Simulator
description: A PSX-style simulation game where you work in a night store. Sell goods and enjoy the process.

name: Inside the Forest
description: You and a group of friends decide to go on a camping trip in the Darkwood Forest, It starts off smoothly, but unforeseen events occur. and it’s only a matter of time before the true horror reveals itself.

name: Superball Mario: Neutral Special
description: This mod replaces Mario's fireball with the superball from Super Mario Land. The new projectile is capable of bouncing off of floors, walls, and ceilings in order to reach places and fighters that Mario would otherwise be unable to reach.

name: Dr. Mario Decloned
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeons 4: Not Another Multiverse
description: Tristan and Thalya are thrown into yet another multiverse and Thalya makes an astounding discovery: The demonic and hordic inhabitants hate them BOTH. There is only one way out of this – and it’s by joining the forces of Evil and Good to find a way back into your own world.

name: Wegi
description: Gather around the wegi board with a group of friends on a stormy Halloween night in the late 1980s. What begins as a harmless game soon spirals into a dark, twisted tale of grief, betrayal, and deception. Wegi invites you to experience a short story-driven adventure to uncover secrets with the group and find out what happened to Sarah the night she died.

name: Pup Cup
description: Sin descripción

name: Lucky Summoner
description:
Want to play it by luck?
Tap to summon! Simple controls!
A new casual tower defense game is now available!

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl: Voice Acting and Items
description: Sin descripción

name: Eigo Monogatari
description:
Eigo Monogatari is a fun and interactive mobile game designed to help Japanese speakers learn English. Celebrate 10 years of engaging storytelling, diverse vocabulary, and exciting gameplay! Join us as we explore the world of Eigo Monogatari and discover how to make English learning an adventure.
Interactive storytelling: Make choices, interact with characters, and shape your own adventure.
Diverse vocabulary: Learn natural English expressions through various situations and conversations.

name: Proximity
description:
Proximity is a word-guessing game that delves deep into the semantics of language. In this game, players are challenged to uncover a hidden word through strategic guessing. Each guess is met with feedback indicating how close it is in meaning to the secret word. This proximity score guides players, helping them hone in on the secret word through associations and semantic relationships...

The game is designed to not only be fun but also educational, enhancing vocabulary and linguistic intuition. Whether you're a language lover or just looking for a fun way to challenge your mind, Proximity offers an engaging way to explore the nuances of language and the power of words. Join us and discover the excitement of finding hidden connections in the world of words!

name: Minecraft: The Garden Awakens
description: This eerie new update to Minecraft: Java Edition adds the Pale Garden, the Creaking, and the new Resin block.

name: Word Grid
description:
The goal is to fill the entire grid with English words while aiming for the lowest possible rarity. Each word should conform to the corresponding category for both the row and column.

Each word will produce a rarity score based on its usage by all other Word Grid players.

name: Dating Killmulator
description: Step into a world where dating goes beyond your typical choices. In this game, you’ll find yourself navigating a twisted, darkly humorous universe filled with popular guys, nice guys, and serial killers. This isn't your standard dating game; it’s a wild parody that plays with every dating sim trope, flipping it on its head.

name: Categories
description:
Discover the challenge of "Categories", a word association game that tests your ability to find links between seemingly unrelated words.

In each round, you are presented with a grid of 16 words and your task is to form four groups of four connected words. Each group must share a unique link, be it a common theme, category, or relationship. As you explore possible categories, keep in mind that the game allows for only four mistakes before ending. Play alone or compete with friends to see who can master the art of making categories!

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.4 - A Storm of Falling Stars
description:
Version 1.4 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New Characters: Miyabi and Harumasa
• New Main Story Quest: A Storm of Falling Stars
• New Events
• ...and more!

name: Flipple
description: Flipple is a word transformation game that challenges your vocabulary and problem-solving skills! In Flipple, you start with a given word and aim to transform it into a target word by changing one letter at a time. Each change must result in a valid word, making each move a test of your word knowledge and strategic thinking.

name: Prisoner of the Mist
description: A fantasy yuri visual novel about two trans women meeting before the eve of Saunheim. It was created for the 2024 edition of the Yuri Game Jam.

name: JR East Train Simulator: Nambu Line (Kawasaki to Tachikawa) E233-8000 series Nambu Branchi Line (Hamakawasaki to Shitte) 205-1000 series Tsurumi Line (Tsurumi to Ogimachi,Okawa,Umi-Shibaura) 205-1100 series
description:
The Nambu Line is a 35.5 km long line connecting Kawasaki Station in Kawasaki City, Kanagawa Prefecture and Tachikawa Station in Tachikawa City, Tokyo.
The Nambu Branch Line is a 4.1 km long line connecting Shitte Station in Kawasaki City, Kanagawa Prefecture and Hama-Kawasaki Station in Kawasaki City, Kanagawa Prefecture.
The Tsurumi Line is a 9.7 km long line connecting Tsurumi Station in Yokohama City, Kanagawa Prefecture and Ogimachi Station in Kawasaki City, Kanagawa Prefecture.
In addition to the main line connecting Tsurumi Station and Ogimachi, the line has two branch lines: the Umi-Shibaura branch line, which branches off from Asano Station and connects to Umi-Shibaura Station, and the Okawa branch line, which branches off from Musashi-Shiraishi Station and connects to Okawa Station.

name: JR East Train Simulator: Yamanote Line (Osaki to Osaki) E235-0 series
description: The Yamanote Line runs in a circle around the center of Tokyo for 34.5 km, taking 59 minutes, and is one of the major lines in the Tokyo metropolitan area, connecting huge terminal stations with world-class passengers.

name: JR East Train Simulator: Utsunomiya Line (Kuroiso to Tokyo) E233-3000 series
description:
Utsunomiya Line is the nickname for trains operating on the 163.3 km long section of the Tohoku Line (between Tokyo Station and Morioka Station) between Tokyo Station and Kuroiso Station. The Utsunomiya Line has been in use since March 10, 1990, at the suggestion of the local governments along the line. In the past, many express and sleeper trains headed for Tohoku and Hokkaido used to run on the line, but now regular and rapid trains make up the majority of the schedule.
Please enjoy the Utsunomiya Line DLC as you travel through the Kanto Plain, experiencing the changing landscape from Tochigi Prefecture to Tokyo, with its sprawling countryside, suburban residential areas, and buildings in the heart of the city.

name: JR East Train Simulator: Yokosuka Line (Kurihama to Tokyo) Series E217
description:
The Yokosuka Line is a 23.9 km long line connecting Kurihama Station in Yokosuka City, Kanagawa Prefecture and Ōfuna Station in Kamakura City, Kanagawa Prefecture. Although the official name of Ōfuna Station to Tōkyō Station is Tōkaido main line, trains run directly from Kurihama Station to Tōkyō Station, so the line between Kurihama and Tōkyō Stations is known as the Yokosuka Line.
The train leaves Kurihama Station for Yokohama Station via Yokosuka Station, a military port town; Kamakura Station,famous for the Daibutsu statue and Tsurugaoka Hachiman Shrine; and Ōfuna Station, where the train joins the Tōkaidō Main Line. After Yokohama Station, the line separates from the Tōkaidō Main Line near Tsurumi Station and heads for Shinagawa Station while running alongside the Tōkaidō Shinkansen via Shin-Kawasaki Station where the Shin-Tsurumi Engine Works, and Musashi-kosugi Station is spead. After Shinagawa Station, the line goes underground to Tōkyō Station, its final destination. We hope you enjoy the various landscapes from the suburbs to the city and the many parallel trains.

name: JR East Train Simulator: Ome Line - Tachikawa to Okutama: E233-0 Series
description:
The Ōme Line is a 37.2 km long line connecting Tachikawa Station in Tachikawa City, Tōkyō, and Okutama Station in Okutama-town, Nishitama-county, Tōkyō. The line runs through residential areas from Tachikawa Station to Ōme Station, but from Ōme Station onward it runs along the Tama River through the mountains. The area between Ōme Station and Okutama Station is known as the Adventure Line, and although it is in Tōkyō, it is an area where visitors can enjoy abundant nature and activities right after getting off the station.
We hope you will enjoy the Ōme Line, which has two distinctive features a double track running through a residential area and a single track running through the mountains.

name: Chop Shop
description: Feel the flow as you hunt, butcher, and cook at a blisteringly fast pace in this action shop-keeping game. Hunt adorable monsters, chop colossal carcasses, and power-slice through huge chunks of flesh to serve your customers even faster. Move fast and stay sharp if you want your shop to survive.

name: Alphabet Soup for Picky Eaters
description: A single-screen puzzle made for the 2024 edition of the Confounding Calendar.

name: Robot Hunt
description:
Robot Hunt is a new fun FPS game where your mission is to destroy a number of robots.

You should try to get as high score as possible on the three difficulty levels, easy medium and hard. So you have to be careful using your ammo.... and your health, because you get more points of these.

There are two courses to play on .... for now.

name: Kono Aozora ni Yakusoku wo
description: Sin descripción

name: DCS World: Black Shark 3
description: DCS: Black Shark 3 is a further development of the well-known Black Shark and Black Shark 2 projects, which are dedicated to the Russian Ka-50 attack helicopter.

name: American Conquest: Anthology
description: American Conquest: Anthology is a PC collection developed by GSC Game World in 2008 and distributed in Italy and Spain by FX Interactive. The FX edition includes the original game and the Fight Back expansion. The game features five stories (the Discovery, Pre-Columbian Civilizations, European Powers, the Conquest of the West, and the War of Independence), and numerous historical figures such as Christopher Columbus, Cortès, Montezuma, George Washington, and many others.

name: DCS World: CH-47F
description: The Boeing CH-47F Chinook fondly referred to as 'The Hook' by US military personnel, stands today as the premier multi-mission rotary wing aircraft in use with the US Army, US Army Reserve, National Guard and 20 other nations including Canada, the United Kingdom, Netherlands, Japan, Italy, Greece, Spain, South Korea, Australia, Türkiye, India and the United Arab Emirates. Embodying a unique tandem rotor design this massive helicopter excels in all its roles, including cargo and troop transportation, sling load operations, search and rescue, casualty evacuation, special operations, and humanitarian assistance in disaster scenarios.

name: SokoNature
description: SokoNature is a Sokoban-inspired game with a unique twist. The character and blocks come in three sizes, each interacting differently. Small characters can't push medium or large blocks, while large characters can push all sizes, with larger blocks moving fewer spaces. The game centers on saving the forest from fires, adding a thematic layer to the puzzle-solving mechanics.

name: Kono Aozora ni Yakusoku wo: Melody of the Sun and Sea
description: An expanded port of Kono Aozora ni Yakusoku wo for PlayStation 2 that replaces the erotic scenes of the original with new content.

name: Couple-Cultivation Saves the World
description: This is a live-action interactive game. As the hero, you find out you become the best cultivation power bank in Jiuqiu by chance. Are you willing to Couple-Cultivate with the girls from another world, save the Earth, and maintain peace in Jiuqiu?

name: The StoryTeller
description: An unreleased video game based around the anthology series of the same name.

name: The Permanent Residence: Souls Kept
description:
The Permanent Residence pulls you into the unsettling world of an isolated bungalow shrouded in mystery and dread. You step into the shoes of a traveling musician, stranded after your shows are suddenly canceled. Desperate and tempted by a 50% discount, you take up an offer to stay in this strange house, blissfully unaware of the horrors that await.

The once-quiet halls now hum with whispers, and the walls seem to hide secrets aching to be uncovered. As you piece together strange clues, the bungalow’s chilling history unfolds—a past filled with rituals, vanishings, and a dark presence that refuses to let go. Soon, you realize that walking out the door might not be as simple as walking in.

name: DCS World: F-16C Arctic Thunder Campaign by Reflected Simulations
description: February 2024. Finland is on the verge of joining NATO, when the unthinkable happens: Russian armed forces push through the border while cruise missiles rain down on the country. Several western allies join the conflict at once to fight alongside their Finnish brothers in arms. Among them is the 112th Fighter Squadron of the Air National Guard, who had just arrived from a training exercise in the UK.

name: Im Bann Der Dunklen Jagd
description: Dive into an immersive co-op horror experience with a friend. As detectives, you’ll search for clues in a sinister area and must survive the horrors lurking within. Work together to find all the objects and escape before doom catches up with you.

name: Hotel Insanity
description: Hotel Insanity is an indie game created by DVloper. The game was published on July 7, 2016.

name: Kono Aozora ni Yakusoku wo: Te no Hira no Rakuen
description: An expanded port that adds a new heroine and four side stories from Fossette.

name: Kono Aozora ni Yakusoku wo: Refine
description: An upcoming remake of Kono Aozora ni Yakusoku wo for PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

name: Electro-Dynamic Mayhem
description: Join the not-so-goody two-shoes robot 'EDM' in a Wario Land 4-inspired speedy‎ platformer where your goal is to cause as much destruction to public property as you can while doing field research.‎

name: Sexdivers
description: SEXDIVERS is an intense survival shooter where you play as a fighter escorting a scientific expedition on a mysterious uninhabited planet.

name: Super Mario Storm I
description: Sin descripción

name: I Didn't Cheat
description:
Hello, Students of Redstone Middle School!
School exams are just around the corner, so start studying to prepare for your graduation.

Remember the rules : no cheating, no phones, no noise during the exam, and focus on your exam sheet.

You're sitting in a school exam, completely lost when it comes to the questions. Your only way out? Cheating with your phone! Just make sure your tough teacher doesn’t catch you in the act!

You will go through 4 days with different guards. Make sure to wear Headphones for a thrilling experience.

name: Pop Star Debut
description: An edited fan translation of the Nintendo Family Computer game Idol Hakkenden. This game seeks to re-translate the game as it may have been translated by people like Ted Woolsey did in the late 80's and early 90's, with less emphasis on accuracy and more on localization.

name: Pretend it's not There
description:
You are a young student returning home from school, burdened by an unsettling presence of something following you. You convince yourself that if you ignore it, it will leave you alone. But as you close your front door, a horrible realization sets in—it followed you inside.

Left alone with the monster in the house, you must carry out your nightly routine, pretending not to notice it's presence.

name: Wicked Plague
description: Play as Ramuel, a young boy who destroys his enemies with his Gun-Lighter. Get inside a haunted building and eradicate the menace!

name: The Eldritch Monarch
description: "The Eldritch Monarch" is a single-player adventure game designed for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis and modern systems. Step into a Lovecraftian world shrouded in eternal winter. "The Eldritch Monarch" is a cinematic platformer enriched with stealth, combat, and intricate puzzles, providing both a nostalgic and modern gaming experience.

name: 100 in 1 Game Collection
description: Meet Magrat the witch, Harvey the weird fish, Stephanie the green cow and all their beloved friends, and embark on an epic journey through 100 arcade games that blend classic gameplay from your favorite retro titles with new concepts that are reinventing the arcade genre! Score as much as you can, then improve and challenge yourself to get all stars in solo or with your friends!

name: Snakebird GB
description: This is a Gameboy recreation / fangame of the amazing puzzle game Snakebird, containing 10 all new levels.

name: Super Sunny World
description: Super Sunny World is the ultimate love letter to the platformer greats of the 8-bit era. Jump, bump, and kick your way through 8 worlds of pixel-perfect platforming, cute characters, and exciting power-ups.

name: 9 R.I.P. Aroma Edition

description: Sin descripción

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Trish Costume V2

name: Tundralia: The Frigid Frontier
description: Tundralia is an RPG in which you play as a novice adventurer, seeking to find fame and fortune in a frozen wasteland. Explore a stylized open world, fight as one of three classes using traditional tab target combat, complete quests, delve into dungeons, and collect a plethora of equipment.

name: Defensurvivor
description: DEFENSURVIVOR is a strategy game where you build obstacles and place and move units to block zombies. There are various units with unique characteristics and powerful high-level units that can be obtained through combination. Use randomly given units to survive until the end!

name: CyberSeas
description: Race around sunken streets in your jet ship, swing between collapsed skyscrapers with your trusty harpoon and build your reputation amongst the colourful inhabitants of the CyberSeas!

name: Arena Breakout: Infinite – Season 1

name: Facing the Rain

name: Vinland Tales
description: Vinland Tales is a Survival Action RPG with casual sandbox game mechanics and big village-building possibilities. You'll experience a new type of survival game with quests, continuous open world progression, frosty surprises in dark winter and opportunities to raid until the Armageddon comes knocking.

name: Laundry Store Simulator
description: Start small and work your way up, upgrading your equipment, designing a stylish store, and expanding your services! Are you ready to own the best Laundry Store in the world?

name: Bakso Simulator 2
description: The Sequel to Bakso Simulator with new gameplay, areas, characters, and more!

name: Unexpected Pigeon Race
description: A pigeon racing game (Checkpoint system) the race passes through ancient Egyptian historical sites (Abu Simbel, Philae, Edfu, Luxor, Karnak, Hatshepsut, Dendera, Abydos and Pyramids).

name: Lost Room: Escape
description: As twilight descends and the world plunges into darkness, you, a seasoned police officer, find yourself answering a harrowing call that shatters the peace of a quiet, unassuming neighborhood. The distressed voice on the other end speaks of Lost Apartment, a place steeped in sinister legends.

name: Gorf the Frog
description: Become a lost frog searching for its destiny in a brutal world filled with dangers. GORF combines classic road-crossing gameplay with soulslike punishing difficulty. Uncover the dark truth behind your seemingly simple mission.

name: Tetrominer
description: Sin descripción

name: Nightfall House
description: Nightfall House is a first-person walking simulator game that allows you to feel as if someone is always around.

name: Weapons of War
description: Weapons of War is a free 3D fantasy MMORPG set in an ancient mythical world, featuring five classes, quests, PvP and PvE environments, and ongoing in-game events

name: Enex2: The Hero's Shadow
description: Sin descripción

name: Warden

name: Vortex

name: The Shattered Veil

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Arctic Thunder Campaign
description: February 2024. Finland is on the verge of joining NATO, when the unthinkable happens: Russian armed forces push through the border while cruise missiles rain down on the country. Several western allies join the conflict at once to fight alongside their Finnish brothers in arms. Among them is the 112th Fighter Squadron of the Air National Guard, who had just arrived from a training exercise in the UK.

name: DCS World: F-16C Last Out: Weasels over Syria II Campaign
description:
Strap back into the legendary F-16C Viper and re-enter the world of the Wild Weasels!
Rejoin Captain Dan 'Forrest' Wilson as he returns to the air to fight for supremacy over the Syrian skies in Last Out - Weasels Over Syria II. Picking up two weeks after the events of First In - Weasels over Syria, LOWOS will see the pilots of the 79th Fighter Squadron once again thrown into unforgiving combat as they battle for survival against the Syrian air defense network. YGBSM!

name: Find Love or Die Trying
description:
Welcome to Find Love or Die Trying, a dating show where ending up single means ending up dead! Will you find love? Or only score a date with death?

Not sure why you'd sign up for this, but now that you're here, you've got 7 days to get
one of the lovely ladies on your tropical island getaway to fall in love with you. If she's
willing to put a ring on it, you're both free to leave.

This version includes both the base game as well as the fan pack.

name: Championship Manager 2010 Special Edition
description:
Championship Manager 2010 Special Edition is an updated version of the popular football management simulation game, Championship Manager 2010. It includes the full game along with additional content.

The Special Edition features extras such as
- Manager's Notepad
- Championship Manager pencil
- Large Poster showcasing the structures of over thirty national leagues.
- Additionally, it offers a subscription-based CM Live service that provides six updates during the football season, allowing players to manage their teams in real-time as the season progresses.

name: Night of the Hermit
description: Sin descripción

name: Dawn's Light 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Stan James Original Free Kick Challenge
description: A betting company created this flash game to market their Euro 2004 offers. In this game, set various gauges that will determine your shot at scoring a goal.

name: Kerry Workout
description: Help Kerry into shape with some advanced aerobics.

name: Kung Fu Statesmen
description: Kung Fu Statesmen is a parody on the political world of the United Kingdom. You choose to play as either Gordon Brown, Tony Blair, or David Blunkett.

name: Garten of Banban VR: Distorting Clay
description: Experience Garten of Banban for the first time in Virtual Reality in this brand new story! Feel full world immersion as you interact with the environments and characters as you attempt to escape from the kindergarten.

name: Park a Lot
description: Park a Lot is a classic browser-based simulation game released in the early 2000s. The game challenges players to step into the role of a parking lot attendant, skillfully navigating vehicles to designated spots within tight time limits. Known for its simple yet addictive gameplay, 'Park a Lot' combines strategy and time management, making it a favorite among fans of casual gaming during the Flash era. Its charming retro design and increasing levels of difficulty provide players with an engaging experience that rewards precision and quick thinking.

name: Prolegomena To a Hyperdimensional Interface That Will Be Able to Manifest From Three-Minute Interchanges
description: This is a fully voiced multi-ending adventure game that progresses by repeating a limited 3-minute dialogue time. Interactions primarily occur through an interface called "choices".

name: Monster Palace
description: Monster Palace is a video game for Windows 95 developed by Clementoni, an Italian toy company. This game falls under the horror genre aimed primarily at children and features a limited release in Italy. However, it was never translated into other languages, making it predominantly available in Italian. The game involves navigating a haunted mansion filled with puzzles and a mysterious atmosphere, where players use tools like tarot cards, crystal balls, and pendulums to solve puzzles.

name: Escape From Sandhill
description: A horror puzzle adventure begins in the spooky tunnels of Sandhill, which can be played as FPS and TPS. Navigate dark corridors, solve complex puzzles, and survive encounters with vengeful shadows born of sinister experiments. Escape the tunnel and survive the mysteries of the neighborhood.

name: Battaglia Navale & Forza 4
description: The game "Battaglia navale & Forza 4", developed by Evviva! Software, combines two classic board games into a single digital package. Released on Windows platforms, this game includes the strategic naval combat of Battaglia navale and the logic-based challenges of Forza 4.

name: Retribution: 25th Anniversary Edition
description:
Anniversary Edition of Half-Life: Retribution mod includes Half-Life 25th Anniversary Update's new features:

- Removed non-working multiplayer and everything connected with it.
- All types of debris have been completely removed.
- New menu background up to Quad HD resolution as "WON" version
- Animated Logo
- New loading screen
- UI items click sound as "WON" version
- Added 4 options in game configuratons "Advanced"
- Removed unsupported menu items
- Added new menu item for demo campain
- New icons for Steam library
- include russian translation.

name: Disney Game Shots: Sparamu
description: Disney Game Shots: Sparamu is part of the Disney Game Shots series developed by Disney Interactive. This specific game draws its theme from the animated movie Mulan and features arcade-style shooting gallery mechanics where players engage in challenges inspired by the film's setting.

name: Unpunished
description: UNPUNISHED game is a horror story game that is endowed with good, realistic graphics and plot

name: I'm a Gensokyo Observer
description: You worked in a company known for getting rid of anomalies and any paranormal activities. One day, you received a letter from Yukari, asking for your assistance in Gensokyo about paranormal activities which this time, it's from a different source. You have to take care of the anomalies in Gensokyo and make Gensokyo safe again. Good luck.

name: Zombie Pandemia 2D
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic: The Fated Hour
description: Sin descripción

name: As Dusk Falls: Special Edition
description:
As Dusk Falls is an original interactive drama from INTERIOR/NIGHT that explores the entangled lives of two families across thirty years.
Special Edition includes: Game, Cinematic Poster, Collector's Box, Dante's Black Book, Postcards, Pins and Desert Dream Motel Replica Key.

name: Care Bears: Unlock the Magic
description: Dive into a world of fun and adventure with the Care Bears in "Care Bears: Unlock the Magic" Play as Cheer Bear and her friends in a variety of arcade games!

name: Myths of the World: Love Beyond
description: Your husband has been kidnapped by a vengeful witch. To save him, you'll need to uncover the secrets of a nearby town before she can destroy it. Can you find the true story of the witch's betrayal? How is the town's Master tied in to all of this? Find the clues to save your love before you become another victim of the witch's wrath!

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero - Collector's Edition
description:
Shake the earth. Break the heavens. Make yours the destructive power of the strongest fighters ever to appear in DRAGON BALL!
Box contents:
Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero
Metallic Bookmark
Dragon Ball:Sparking! Zero Exclusive Diorama 264 x 174 mm
Digital Content

name: Dragon's Dogma II: Lenticular Edition
description: Dragon's Dogma is a single player, narrative driven action-RPG that challenges players to choose their own experience – from the appearance of their Arisen, their vocation, their party, how to approach different situations and more.

name: Eldrador Creatures: Shadowfall
description: The adventure-filled worlds of Eldrador are in danger! Lead battle-ready creatures in turn-based strategic combat to defeat a mysterious shadowy menace.

name: Enotria: The Last Song - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition of Enotria: The Last Song includes:

ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK EXTRACT

DIGITAL ARTBOOK EXTRACT

EXCLUSIVE WEAPON SKINS SET

UPGRADE WEAPON MATERIALS

UPGRADE MASK MATERIALS

UPGRADE LINES MATERIALS

EXTRA MIRACLE PESTO

EXTRA HYMN OF VIGOR

EXTRA ARMONIA SAP

name: Fisher-Price: Big Action Construction
description: Fisher-Price Big Action Construction is an activity center game released on September 17, 1998. It is Funnybone's take on Tonka Construction. In the game, the player can visit different work areas of the Big Action Construction Site. Collector Cards are rewarded for playing the actives. Obtaining all the collector cards in an activity will reward the player a certificate. One all six are completed, the player is declared a "number-one construction worker".

name: Kena: Bridge of Spirits - Premium Edition
description:
Kena: Bridge of Spirits is a story-driven, action adventure combining exploration with fast-paced combat. The story follows Kena, a young spirit guide who uses her magical abilities to help deceased people move from the physical to the spirit world.
Premium Edition contains:
• Base Game
• Official Digital Soundtrack
• Unique Kena Staff
• Golden Rot Skin
• Retail Exclusive Sticker Sheet
• Xbox Exclusive Pirate-Themed Hats

name: Morkull: Ragast's Rage - Collector's Edition
description:
A 2D video game that combines platforming and action with a touch of exploration in which we control Morkull, God of death and darkness and lord of the Ragast, whose main mechanics lies in the breaking of the fourth wall, which will allow Morkull to communicate with the player in various ways.
The Collector's Edition contains:
• The Base Game (Standard Edition)
• Special Box with exclusive illustration
• An Artbook
• 4 stickers
• Postcards Set
• Original soundtrack on CD-ROM
