name: Castle Doombad: Free To Slay
description:
Embrace your inner villain in Castle Doombad: Free To Slay, the thrilling blend of strategy, tower defense TD, and trap-based puzzling!

Take on the role of the ultimate Big Boss Bad Guy, building traps and defenses for your sinister lair to thwart the relentless onslaught of pesky heroes.

name: Castle Doombad Classic
description: Become the villain and slay any hero who dares enter your evil domain! Deploy traps and minions as the ultimate diabolical dungeon keeper in this Tower Defense puzzler. Includes the 2014 Castle Doombad game plus new improvements and content.

name: Attack Hole
description:
Can you move the black hole to swallow the arms down the hole? Can you bite the bullet and rule the black hole games solo or on multiplayer?

Your quest is easy in Attack Hole io game. The clock is ticking, tik tok, tik tok, will you succeed to swallow the bullet in this circle game, and eat it all like a wormhole in your favorite black hole games?

This eating simulator can be played solo, or multiplayer, you can use the wormhole, eat the bullet and upgrade your black holes!

Choose among your favorite black holes skins and go into the eating games in the hall full of weapons and bullet stacks and try to clear them like in those eating games! If you swallow the whole io weapon, you will have more bullet power to fight and destroy bosses who dare your black holes! Become the black hole hero attacker in this corn hole io game!

name: The Legend of Shiande
description: An old-school, extremely challenging game that combines RPG, adventure, and puzzle elements. Designed to test the skills and determination of players who thrive on tough challenges.

name: And Roger
description: It was a morning like all others, until she realized her dad wasn't home. In his place, a stranger who speaks nonsense and insists she "takes her medicine". Who is he? Where is dad?

name: Girls Made Pudding
description:
"When there's nobody there to see you, you disappear."

In Girls Made Pudding, two girls tour a series of towns that people have disappeared from. Follow them on the road as they find out the mysteries of this world.

name: Castle Doombad 2: Muahaha!
description: Sin descripción

name: Sofia in Exchange for Lies
description: Peek into the sins and memories of five personalities through surveillance cameras. This is an immersive, mystery adventure game that unravels the thoughts of the dark past that lie dormant inside Sofia, a suspect in the murder of a presidential candidate, and uncovers the truth behind the crime.

name: Re:Choice
description:
"I told you, with you, we can start over!"
Choices that weren't available in the first playthrough become unlocked in the second. A time-loop adventure RPG where the story branches from the very beginning, depending on your decisions.

name: Mahou Shoujo no Majo Saiban
description: When the girls wake up, they find themselves in an unfamiliar prison mansion. As the looming "Witch Trial" approaches, investigate the prison mansion and uncover the witch hidden among the girls. Expose the witch's magic and lies, and execute her.

name: Chonkers
description: Chonkers is a cozy and relaxing idle game. Adopt the cutest fur balls and watch them ramp up the chonk scale as you play with them. Find them a new family. They’ll pay A LOT for your hefty chonker! Complete your collection by finding all the breeds and the rarest space cats!

name: Disney 20Q
description: Sin descripción

name: Slime Nomi
description: Slime Nomi is a platformer with creative ideas. Help Nomi collect potion ingredients and concoct witch Millie's extraordinary potion.

name: 20Q Music: Rock and Pop
description: Sin descripción

name: Doctor Who 20Q
description: Sin descripción

name: Alone A Long
description: In a world where you are alone, you repeat your daily routine in a nonchalant and somewhat joyful manner. A simulation game to maintain civilization where the objective is to maintain civilization until the day when you can no longer move.

name: Terbis
description: "A being who dreams, and a being born from dreams... A journey on the border between dreams and reality will soon begin."

name: IF: Imaginary Friends
description: The main character, a young boy named Croqui, is reunited with the imaginary friends he created in his infancy due to a mental regression caused by the birth of his younger sister. Fearing that he will be forgotten again, the friends try to trap him in their imaginary world by playing games with him! You are Croqui and you will win the game with your friends. An adventure game with an atmosphere like a picture book or a painting, featuring unique imaginary friends.

name: Puchitto Rock Shooter
description: Puchitto★Rock Shooter was a spin-off title of Black★Rock Shooter media franchise featuring chibi characters.

name: Puchitto Rock Shooter: Pursue the Mystery of the Sexy Planet
description: Puchitto Rock Shooter: Pursue the Mystery of the Sexy Planet was the successor title to Puchitto Rock Shooter browser game.

name: Warshovel
description: Sin descripción

name: Resident Evil Village: VR Mode
description:
Experience unparalleled realism powered by PlayStation VR2 and PlayStation 5 as you enter the meticulously crafted, visually stunning world of Resident Evil Village.

With the PlayStation VR2 Sense controllers, you’ll feel like you can reach out and touch objects and items as you go far beyond the 2D screen experience and dive into a terrifying story that will shock your senses.

The following Resident Evil Village additional contents are only partially supported in VR Mode:
- Additional Content: Trauma Pack
Samurai Edge - AW Model-01
Saferoom Music "Go Tell Aunt Rhody”
Mr. Everywhere Weapon Charm
Mr. Raccoon Weapon Charm
- Additional Content: Survival Resources Pack

The Winters’ Expansion, The Mercenaries, and Extra Content Shop All Access Voucher contents are not supported.

name: Weirdo
description: Weirdo is a Japanese manga-style visual novel set in DYL High School. It follows Wang Zhe, an ordinary and frail boy, who tries to win the hearts of girls and complete his experiments. He gets entangled in bizarre events, plunging into darkness. Each choice you make determines his fate.

name: Just Get 10
description: A number-combining game similar to 2048, with the objective of combining identical single-digit numbers bordering each other until you reach a 10.

name: Sudoku Quest
description: A Sudoku game for mobile devices with a loosely-structured level system.

name: Mini Golf Simulator
description: A new style of mini golf game where you swing with the Joy-Con hanging down!

name: Dalafri
description: This title is a physics-based 3D sword fighting game. Players take on the role of a slightly flexible warrior and aim to become a champion in the arena.

name: Sheeeroom
description: You wish to bring "She" back to life to reclaim something precious you’ve lost. Solve the various puzzles set before you and gather what "She" needs. Even you don’t know what "She" truly is. "sheeeroom" is a mysterious adventure game.

name: The Headliners
description: Co-op horror game where you play in teams of 1 to 4 reckless journalists, ready to explore a city overrun by deadly creatures to snap spectacular footage. Your only goal: make the headlines without becoming one.

name: Unlight: Revive
description:
This is a story-centered competitive training card game. Players explore and conquer quest mode (single player) with character cards to obtain treasure chests, train and customize their character cards, and explore deck construction that suits their strategy, such as focusing on preemptive action, attack, defense, or overall balance. Not only do trained character cards increase their HP and attack/defense stats, but they also learn special moves unique to each character, which, when conditions are right, can deal significant damage and battle effects to enemies.

Deck construction is also a crucial factor when battling other players in Duel Mode (PvP), so build your deck carefully yet boldly.

name: Dracula X: Nocturne In the Moonlight - Ultimate
description: A mod which enhances the originally Japan-only game with some new features (like fixed sprites and transparency, the inclusion of a hard mode) along with content from other versions, especially the PlayStation version.

name: Word Chase
description:
Word Chase is a word building game where players attempt to find as many words in the game as possible and earn a high score.

Words must be at least 2 letters long. Each letter connects to any adjacent letter, including those beside, above, below, or diagonally. Connect letters to form words. Each letter is worth 10 points. Starting with the 6th letter in a word, each letter is worth 20 points. Words only count once, even if you find them using different paths on the grid.

name: GrindFest
description: GrindFest is a free-to-play idle programming action fantasy RPG where players utilize C# programming to create bots that engage in combat, loot, and cooperate with one another.

name: Karting of Banban
description: Grip your steering wheel and join your favorite Banban characters in the race of a lifetime! Drift around tight corners and zoom through locations both old and new. Use power-ups and boosts to dodge your opponents and claim first place!

name: April Freebee
description: April Freebee is an April Fools game which was disguised as an instrument for the Kontakt Player.

name: Presidential Knockout
description: Presidential Knockout is a comedic Flash-based fighting game developed by Miniclip. The game allows players to choose a presidential candidate to engage in a humorous boxing match, using simple keyboard controls for jabs, uppercuts, and blocking.

name: Colorfle Unlimited
description: Colorfle Unlimited: Challenge yourself with Colorfle, a color mixing puzzle game. Mix and match colors to guess the target combination in 6 tries. Play free, no download needed!

name: Caretaker: The Bureau
description:
You are the caretaker.
Today is your first day on the job in organization called The Bureau. Your task is to carefully observe and report all anomalies or deviations.

If you do well - a promotion awaits you.
If you don't - The Bureau breaks the contract.

Can you handle this task?

name: PaRappa the Rapper: Stage 1 Music A
description: Sin descripción

name: PaRappa the Rapper: Stage 1 Music B
description: Sin descripción

name: PaRappa the Rapper: Stage 1 Music C
description: Sin descripción

name: PaRappa the Rapper: Stage 1 Music D
description: Sin descripción

name: PaRappa the Rapper: Stage 2 Music A
description: Sin descripción

name: PaRappa the Rapper: Stage 3 Music A
description: Sin descripción

name: PaRappa the Rapper: Stage 4 Music A
description: Sin descripción

name: PaRappa the Rapper: Stage 5 Music A
description: Sin descripción

name: Rule The Beach Volleyball
description: Rule the Beach is a 3D sports simulation game that immerses players in the fast-paced and vibrant world of beach volleyball. Combining realistic visuals with intuitive controls, this game challenges players to master the art of serving, spiking, and volleying while competing in scenic beach settings. Its dynamic gameplay, enhanced by responsive physics, makes for a fun and engaging experience.

name: M&M's: Do You Remember Color?
description: Our world may have gone monochrome, but you still remember color, right? Take this fast-paced quiz, see if you still know your colors, and keep their spirit alive!

name: Big Babies: Instructions
description: Sin descripción

name: Big Babies: Argument
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Nitro Tour Grand Prix
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Back N. Time Grand Prix
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Spyro N. Friends Grand Prix
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Spooky Grand Prix
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Neon Circus Grand Prix
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Winter Festival Grand Prix
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Rustland Grand Prix
description: Themed on a post-apocalyptic desert world.

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Gasmoxia Grand Prix
description: Themed on science-fiction and a fast-food war above Gasmoxia.

name: Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled: Post-Grand Prix
description: Update themed around Beenox's brand colors

name: Ninjaman
description: The game features a "runner" style action gameplay, where players guide the samurai through various stages, dodging obstacles and engaging in combat to reach the end of each level​.

name: Move or Die: Unleashed
description: Sin descripción

name: Simon
description: Follow the pattern of lights and sounds for as long as you can remember them. The lights show up faster the more sequences you correctly recall.

name: Skateboard Jam
description: Sin descripción

name: Raisond'etre
description:
Will you be able to uncover your raison d'être and solve the mysteries that await in this suspenseful thriller?

In this 2D adventure title, players can explore as they please, examine objects, solve a series of riddles, and complete a variety of minigames.

name: Symble
description: A code-cracking logic game, where players must guess a secret five letter word. Each guess reveals a set of three mystery symbols, and players must use their guesses to determine what each symbol represents in order to decode the secret word.

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Ultimate Collection
description:
Unleash the ultimate Need for Speed Unbound experience in one package with the Ultimate Collection. Enjoy instant access to all post-launch premium content, and the Vol. 9 Premium Speed Pass. Get access to 9 fully customizable cars, over 45 Customs, and 100+ additional cosmetics.

INCLUDES:
- Keys to the Map
- Vol. 9 Premium Speed Pass** (upon release)
- Vol. 8 Premium Speed Pass
- Vol. 8 Dynamic Catch-Up Pack** (Including Premium Speed Pass Content, upon release)
- Vol. 7 Dynamic Catch-Up Pack (Including Premium Speed Pass Content)
- Vol. 6 Dynamic Catch-Up Pack (Including Premium Speed Pass Content)
- Vol. 5 Catch-Up Pack
- Vol. 5 Customs Pack
- Trick or Street Swag Pack
- Vol. 4 Catch-Up Pack
- Hip Hop Origin Swag Pack
- Vol. 4 Customs Pack
- Vol. 3 Catch-Up Pack
- Robojets Swag Pack
- Vol. 3 Customs Pack

name: Crusty Proto
description:
Unknown incomplete and glitchy game, with build date roughly around 1997, found in a pack of CD bought in a garage lot.
It tries to mimic Resident Evil very hard, as it was big hit at the time.

Though in this state, i think i know who to blame, why it didn't make it to release...

name: Onibito Kiki
description: Experience ONIBITO KIKI’s first game adaptation in 90s-style 2D action! Play as KIKI, leader of the ONIBITO clan, using special abilities to conquer tough missions. Enjoy retro pixel art combined with modern gameplay—join KIKI on an epic adventure!

name: Motus
description: A short exploration game presented with black and white noise in a way that is impossible to see through static images.

name: Grabbed by the Ghoulies
description: When Grabbed By The Ghoulies was featured in Rare Replay, it only the other games in the collection got itself remastered to run natively on the Xbox One.

name: CrimeBot 2: Unsolved Cold Case
description: Become a detective in CrimeBot 2 and travel the world solving criminal cases. You'll have only your logic and intuition to analyze dossiers filled with clues, suspect profiles, and photographs. Can you catch the culprit?

name: Jelly Troops
description: An online action RTS where the tide can turn in a flash! Fight exciting battles where you recruit golems to battle your opponent’s slimes, cleverly redirect their slimes with walls, or sneakily steal their flag to make a dramatic comeback.

name: Overwatch 2: Season 14 - Hazard
description: Introducing Hazard, the new Tank hero, embodying the spirit of anarchy for the greater good. Then test your skills with a unique blend of past and present in the 6v6 Role Queue event, using the 2-2-2 setup. Plus, master the elements with an Overwatch 2 x Avatar: The Last Airbender collab event, celebrating unity, resilience, and the power within. And don’t miss out on Mythic Thor Reinhardt.

name: Todesangst
description:
Todesangst is a single player Half-Life modification, which follows an alternate timeline where the nuclear destruction of Black Mesa and the Seven Hour War never happened.

Gordon is back from Xen, and it's all business as usual. That is, until a sinister scientist named Jack Newell, motivated by morbid curiosity and seething hatred of Gordon, decides to start another bloodbath, forcing Gordon and his friend Joe to put a stop to his experiments with Xen creatures.

Todesangst (pronounced TOH-dess-ahngst) is a German word that literaly means fear of death, but is usually translated as meaning terror or dread.

name: Rabbids Arby's Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: Todesangst 2: Der Echte Feind
description: Sequel to the original Todesangst, Todesangst 2 is a single player Half-Life modification, made by a team of 10 people taken for 15 months to develop and released in December 2002.

name: Icarly vs. Bigfoot
description: Sin descripción

name: The Twins
description: The Twins is a game made by DVloper, released on November 19th, 2020 for both Android and iOS.

name: Three Kingdoms Heroes
description: Sin descripción

name: Skate City: New York
description: Navigate the iconic streets of New York City as you master hundreds of tricks in famous, real-world skate spots. Jump over taxis, dodge pedestrians and string together impressive combos to land your highest scores.

name: DCS World: F-5E Remastered
description: The F-5E was developed in the early 1970s as a light tactical fighter. It is an upgraded version of the earlier F-5A. Combat roles of the F-5E include both air-to-air and unguided ground attack. In the United States, it has excelled as an aggressor. Given its mission flexibility, ease of operation, and low cost, the F-5E continues to serve air forces including Iran, Switzerland, and others.

name: Do No Harm
description: A Doctor Simulator with a Lovecraftian twist. Diagnose patients by analyzing unsettling symptoms and treat them using your Book of Medicine. Make moral choices — decide who to save or kill, discover whom to trust, and unlock multiple endings! Can you endure 30 days of perilous decisions?

name: My Plushy Shift
description: In My Plushy Shift, your Task is to collect around the Office. Sounds simple enough, though things get difficult as you start hallucinating about toys and - walking Plushies. Collect around all Rooms while struggling through the Plushy Hallucinations.

name: Morrigan's Isle
description: Stave off waves of enemies that grow in strength and number as each night passes and defend the Tree of Life. Survive, harvest resources, craft armor and weapons, outfit helper NPCs, and build a base protected by auto-firing towers. Explore the island to find gear with the power of the Celtic Gods.

name: Comet Force
description: Sin descripción

name: Eyes That Hypnotise
description: A cozy, hand-drawn puzzle where you arrange fluffy friends to fit the grid. With their funny big eyes and a calming mood, this game offers a relaxing escape.

name: Dimensional Illusion
description: Dimensional illusion is a real-time strategy game that combines role-playing with friendly placement. Each map scene is a new experience, and by combining friendly formations and skill combinations, lead your character to defeat powerful bosses.

name: Epic Walk
description: Sin descripción

name: Love Angel Syndrome
description:
"Ah… the binary… it's beautiful. You're beautiful."

Yuuna, our protagonist and mentally ill NEET, spends most of her days browsing forums about her favorite anime, Ai no Uta ★ Tenshi Senshi 𝄞. One day she stumbles across an ad claiming to have a desktop assistant modeled after Ai, the main character of Ai no Uta.

Unable to resist the allure of talking with her favorite character, Yuuna downloads the program. Ai-chan turns out to be the girlfriend Yuuna’s always dreamed of– but can a relationship with no boundaries really flourish? Can an AI program actually feel real human love?

name: Mega Man 2 Randomizer
description: A Randomizer mod for Mega Man 2

name: Knight-Blade: Howling of Kerberos
description: In 2077, after World War IV, Cain Graywood, betrayed by the Elite and having his friends killed, enters their headquarters for revenge. What awaited him was the strongest armored forces, with the forbidden super weapon "EX-ARMS".

name: A Tiny Wander
description: Buu must deliver a package through a deep forest. Despite many attempts to challenge the forest, he has not succeeded. Chat with passersby, explore, and take breaks at campsites, while searching for a way to get through the forest. Let's go on a small nighttime adventure with Buu!

name: Life of a Lonely Indie Game Developer
description: "Create the games you want, at the time you want, and live doing only what you love." In this realistic life simulation game, an independent game developer dreams of such a life, struggling with money and time while paying taxes until death. Whether this life is happy or truly lonely, you decide.

name: Draconic Date
description: By invoking the old Dragon Law, you managed to get your dragon girlfriend out for a date. What will you discover in that old abandoned castle, and what bounds will you forge with Iryl?

name: Abyss Seeker: What Do You See Deep in The Abyss
description: A dungeon known as the Abyss has suddenly appeared. To open the "Door of Darkness" at its deepest point, the Seeker plunges into the dungeon gate... in search of the truth. Survive the onslaught of dark forces in this twin-stick survival shooter! — Do you have the will?

name: Galaxy Life
description:
The new owner of Galaxy Life, Phoenix Network, has decided not to revive Pocket Adventures. The main reasons for this were the fact that the game was too old (it could not be placed on Google Play anymore), and the fact that they were lacking the source code of the game. They plan a new mobile version, but it will be compatible with Flash, and thus will not be the same PA anymore. That's why this wiki will only get minimal updates, to keep the spirit of PA alive!

Explore the world of Galaxy Life, build a space colony, attack enemies, grab items and rule the universe. Galaxy Life is full of interesting planets and characters. You'd be surprised how big Galaxy Life is! In this free to play MMO strategy game that mixes traditional easy-to-play casual gameplay mechanics with touches of more traditional genres and features like tower defense, RTS, or several competitive PvP features in a persistent on-line Galaxy. You play together with others or your friends and take on evil, so gather your friends to fight evil in this Galaxy Life social game!

name: Metal Slug SB Fanthology
description:
Metal Slug SB Fanthology is a fan game developed by SuperBlinky, which has been in development since 2020. The latest version of the project is 0.7.2.

The main goal of the project is to create 8 new Metal Slug experiences based on the 8 mainline games, while also providing a 4-Player Co-op and a new VS. mode.

name: Arenum
description: The war between the Omega and Theta galaxies cannot be resolved in favor of either of the two contenders and so it was decided to have the two best pilots of their respective armies face each other in a duel to the death. These two drivers are you and a friend of yours who will have the courage to face you. The weapon supplied for both is a starfighter with two laser cannons. The location is the boundary between the two galaxies. The hour is twelfth. You can fight each other across the entire screen and the player who hits their opponent twenty times wins.

name: DCS World: AH-64D Outpost Campaign by Stone Sky
description: Explore the chronicles of the Syrian War in the OUTPOST campaign series. In the second installment, you'll dive into the events of 2012-2017, piloting the AH-64 Apache helicopter. Take on the role of U.S. pilots navigating through some of the most challenging phases of this conflict.

name: DCS World: F-16C Dragon's Fury Campaign by SorelRo
description: Dragon's Fury: DCS F-16 Viper is a fictional story-based campaign that will test your skills using the DCS F-16 Viper in a variety of missions while you operate with the 23rd Fighter Squadron, The Fighting Hawks.

name: The Short Bread Game
description: A cozy platformer where you help a piece of bread get to the bakery for breakfast. Though your path there may not be the most direct, you'll get to explore charming places. Jump high, run from enemies, and engage in witty dialogue with your odd new friend.

name: Cast Dice Away
description: A board game-style survival adventure on a deserted island! In Cast Dice Away, roll dice to explore the island, gather resources, and survive. Each roll triggers unpredictable events, challenging you to strategically navigate diverse environments as you seek escape.

name: Industrial Annihilation
description: The next major game in the Planetary Annihilation universe, Industrial Annihilation combines the iconic real-time strategy of the beloved Annihilation games with deep factory-building to deliver a blend of genres unlike any you’ve experienced before.

name: Match Point
description: Match Point is a tennis video game released in 1984–1985 for the Amstrad CPC, Atari ST, Commodore 64, ZX Spectrum and Sinclair QL by Psion and other publishers and, under the title Tournament Tennis, on ColecoVision , Commodore 64 and MS-DOS by Imagic. It was also published for Thomson TO7, Thomson MO6 and Thomson MO5 under the title Super Tennis. Some editions for Atari ST, Commodore 64 (on cartridge) and DOS used the simple title Tennis.

name: Short Trip
description: An interactive illustration five years in the making where you drive a cat tram through picturesque mountain villages. A relaxed, casual, delightful experience. Ding ding!

name: Dirtbag Mahjong
description:
Lie, cheat, and steal your way to victory in Dirtbag Mahjong!

Choose your character and join five other dirtbags for a night of riichi mahjong - with a twist. Nobody here plays fair, and they've all got some dirty tricks up their sleeves.

Dirtbag Mahjong is a complete and beginner-friendly mahjong experience that also offers some party game surprises to keep experienced players guessing.

name: DCS World: UH-1H Peacekeeper Lebanon Campaign by Flying Cyking
description:
Lebanon, September 2006.
It has been four weeks since the end of the second Lebanon war (July War). UN Forces have been deployed to ensure the ceasefire agreement and stabilize the southern regions of Lebanon.

name: Silent Hill: The Arcade
description:
Silent Hill: The Arcade is an arcade game based on Silent Hill survival horror series by Konami. The Arcade has currently never been officially ported to consoles or on PC, thus the game is rare.

However, in February 2014, it was unofficially ported to PC (Windows XP & 7) by a group of talented fans known as Insert More Coins, although setting up the game may be difficult as it can only run on monitors that support 640x480 resolution and is apparently not Windows 10-compatible.

On Sept 2015, another fan known as Biffman 101 re-published the port on their blog and following a conversation with an anonymous commenter, in 2019, a Windows 10 compatible version was emerged and published, on their blog post (The Collection Chamber - SILENT HILL: THE ARCADE).

name: Covenant
description: Covenant is a first-person dark fantasy combat game in which you play as a messenger sent from above. Wield martial arts, secret magic, and ancient weapons to explore a vast interconnected world.

name: Snoopy no Hajimete no Otsukai
description: The Japan-only sequel to Snoopy's Magic Show where Snoopy walks around in an isometric world doing Charlie Brown's shopping.

name: Spatial Ops
description: Sin descripción

name: Breath of Death VII: The Beginning - Reanimated
description: The fast-paced supernatural RPG, Breath of Death VII, has been resurrected and remastered! Embark with our undead heroes on a bone-rattling post-apocalyptic adventure through an undead world, now more vibrant than ever, to exhume the mysteries of the past.

name: Fortnite OG
description:
FORTNITE OG is BACK and here to stay. Drop into Chapter 1 and explore the OG map, collect OG loot, and relive OG gameplay.

THE OG OG RETURNS Solos or Squads, drop into battle with Fortnite OG: Chapter 1. Build your way to pure victory in Battle Royale or dominate the Island in a new way with Zero Build. Each Fortnite OG season runs approximately two months, bringing back the legendary loot and features from back in the day.

CLASSIC COOL IN THE OG PASS The Fortnite OG Pass features 45 tiers of retro rewards with a modern twist on items and Outfits. A new OG Pass will be available every OG season for 950 V-Bucks or in Fortnite Crew including the OG Pass, new Battle Royale, Music and LEGO Passes in Fortnite Crew for 1,400 V-Bucks. Getting this add-on is not necessary to access this content.

name: BlockTanks
description: A web browser tank game focused on multiplayer battles in a simplistic format. Featuring multiple battle modes, weapon types, maps, and community maps.

name: River Towns
description: Solve puzzles by placing buildings and creating vibrant cities in River Towns. Each district has its own style and shapes, making every level a new challenge. Help to restore and rebuild our River Towns.

name: Midnight Snack
description: Midnight Snack is a short single-player horror game about making a sandwich

name: Fortnite Reload
description: Fortnite Reload is a 40-player fast-paced Battle Royale game that is all about carrying the squad to Victory. Reboot as long as one teammate is still in the action! Loot up after rebooting to get back into fighting shape! Eliminate opponents to reboot teammates faster! Near the end of the match, reboots will stop. Lock in with your squad to secure the Victory Royale!

name: Are You Kidding Me?
description: A slice of life adventure with a collection of narrative driven micro games all about the inhabitants of Nowhere Space - where all lost and forgotten things end up.

name: The Queen of Battlers 2
description:
The Queen of Battlers 2 is a 2016 crossover fighting game by doujin circle Capricorn. It parodies the "King of Fighters" series and features a cast made up of female characters from various visual novels. It is the sequel to the 2012 game The Queen of Battlers.
Characters are organized into teams, representing the following games: ONE (Tactics), Kanon (Key), AIR (Key), Clannad (Key), Little Busters! (Key), Tayutama (Lump of Sugar), SHUFFLE! (Navel), Really? Really! (Navel), and Tick! Tack! (Navel). The characters Kanna (from AIR), and Saber (from Fate/stay night) are also featured as individual characters who are not part of any team. Secret characters include Saber Alter and an alternative version of Sakura Yae.

name: Rusty Road Racing
description: A fun rally simulator focusing on car physics modeling, tire skidding, and suspension functionality! Full camera customization, recording, and sharing features! Incredible turns and jumps await drivers who are crazy enough!

name: Call of Duty Black Ops 6: Season 1
description: Ready to wreak havoc? The Black Ops 6 era is here. Prepare for a vast new season of content with five Multiplayer maps plus a festive Nuketown variant, seven new weapons, a brand-new Zombies map, and full Call of Duty: Warzone integration along with a new Resurgence map.

name: Headquarters: World War II - Ardennes
description: Headquarters: World War II - Ardennes is the second DLC for Headquarters: World War II, a fast-paced turn-based strategy game where your battlefield tactics are as important as your army management skills.

name: The Talos Principle: Reawakened
description: Step back into a world of thought-provoking puzzles, philosophical intrigue, and breathtaking visuals with The Talos Principle: Reawakened - a first-person puzzle masterpiece for both new players and long-time fans alike.

name: Rule the Waves 3: Expanded Battles
description: Prepare to return to the definitive naval warfare simulation game, Rule the Waves 3, with the new Expanded Battles expansion! Take your love and knowledge of 20th century naval warfare from the exciting campaigns of the base game and get ready to craft and fight the naval battles of your dreams.

name: Commander: Europe at War
description: Commander: Europe at War is a turn-based strategy game and a remake of the 2007 classic. Spanning six epic WWII campaigns, command air, land, and sea forces, research advanced technologies, manage resources, and strategically assign commanders to shift the course of battle.

name: Distant Worlds 2: Return of the Shakturi
description: An ancient evil is returning to the vast universe of Distant Worlds 2. The Return of the Shakturi is the third expansion and first feature expansion for the acclaimed 4X space strategy game, Distant Worlds 2. It adds a full endgame crisis and story, along with numerous new gameplay features and improvements that elevate the experience to new heights.

name: Annoy Squidward
description: Total conversion mod that transforms Springfield into Bikini Bottom.

name: Headquarters: World War II - Market Garden
description: Headquarters: World War II - Market Garden introduces a new British campaign with 8 meticulously crafted battles covering the events of Operation Market Garden. Your force has to reach the paratroopers holding the key bridges as soon as possible. However, nothing goes according to plan - and your troops have to deal with the ensuing chaos.

name: Monster Galaxy: Exile
description: Battle & tame hundreds of insane creatures in Monster Galaxy: Exile, the sequel to the most popular monster-battling game on iOS!

name: Chained Echoes: Ashes of Elrant
description: Eldrea is calling once again. Eldrea needs you. One. More. Time. Ashes of Elrant is the official DLC for the highly acclaimed Chained Echoes, offering you more of what you enjoyed so much. Meet all your beloved characters and answer the call as the Crimson Wings are needed once again.

name: On My Way Home
description: You're standing at the bus stop, eager to get home, when suddenly, the unexpected happens. Desperation pushes you to knock on the door of a nearby house, hoping for help, but stepping inside turns out to be a mistake you’ll regret.

name: Undertale 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Nice Day for Fishing
description: The world needs you Adventurer! Embark on an RPG pixel adventure where you’ll play as Baelin the humble fisherman, who must rise-up to become the hero of Honeywood. Battle fish with precision timing and magic spells, upgrade your abilities, defeat evil and rebuild Honeywood.

name: Atmosfear: The Third Dimension
description: Atmosfear: The Third Dimension is a 1995 PC game based on the Atmosfear video board game series. It combines strategy, horror, and time-sensitive challenges as players race against the clock to escape a supernatural realm.

name: Yellow Trouble
description: 8-way water gun blasting horizontal 2D arcade co-op shoot ‘em up, with ducks?!

name: Virtual Cottage 2
description: Virtual Cottage 2 motivates and supports you in tackling your daily tasks. Use its built-in productivity tool to accomplish your goals faster. Create your ultimate cozy space with a wide range of different furniture.

name: Sheol Inferno
description:
Sheol is a roguelike card game based on Dante's Divine Comedy.

You will accompany Dante on his journey through the 9 circles of Hell and fight alongside him to defeat the guardians of the circles.

Use the cards from the Spanish deck or Poker deck to complete the missions that will be assigned to you in each circle and thus be able to access the next one.

During the game you will earn gold that will allow you to obtain Blessings to help you on your adventure and, at the end of the game, you will be able to improve your skills on your character sheet.

FEATURES:
- Card roguelike.
- Spanish deck of cards or Poker deck.
- Character progression.
- Deck Management.
- Based on the lore of the Divine Comedy.
- Highly replayable.
- NO micro transactions.

name: TankHead
description:
Embark on a thrilling journey as Whitaker, piloting a drone-controlled tank through the desolate ECA. Battle fierce enemies, scavenge valuable parts, and fight to survive in this fast-paced sci-fi world, as you strive to reach the mysterious Highpoint.

As Whitaker, your goal is to fight to reach Highpoint. To do that, you must traverse the Event Containment Area – an area where humans cannot survive. Whitaker must project his mind into a Needle, a robust drone capable of surviving in the harsh conditions of the ECA, and also of piloting your Tank. Use your Needle and Tank to combat the vehicles and creatures of the ECA to reach Highpoint.

Explore the ECA, a world torn apart by war and a mysterious cataclysmic event that left it uninhabitable by humans. Explore the Deadzone, where humans must “tele-project” their minds into drones in order to survive and pillage the remains of a once great society.

Your vehicle of choice is a Light Tank, capable of moving quickly and delivering devastating damage to your enemies and the reactive world around you. Your tank can be equipped with various weapons, armors, wheels, motors and abilities to customize your gameplay.

Use a variety of weaponry to dismantle your enemies, blow off their parts, and take a clear shot at their exposed weak points to deliver decisive blows. Defeated enemies will leave behind their remaining parts for you to salvage or steal. Take what you need, scrap the rest. Use everything to survive.

name: Atlas
description: Sin descripción

name: Steampunk Shinobi
description: Steampunk Shinobi is a roguelite action game set in a Steampunk/Medieval Japan-inspired world. Play as a lineage of Shinobi, where each death passes the quest to the next generation. Procedurally generated maps evolve with your actions, making every playthrough unique!

name: Dungeon Crawler
description: Dungeon Crawler is an upcoming roguelite, hack n' slash, platformer puzzle game. Makhoba discusses how Dungeon Crawler's imagination mechanic works, the inspiration behind the game's creation, and more.

name: GameMaker 25th Anniversary
description: Join us in celebrating twenty five years of GameMaker with GameMaker 25th Anniversary! A fun look at the process behind creating the world's greatest 2D Game Engine! Manage your development house, keep your employees happy, and squash bugs as they come up!

name: Muri: Wildworlds
description: Explore the mysterious creature-filled Wildwoods as a Muri. Find secrets, solve puzzles, befriend creatures, and clean away the corruption. Restore the world's beauty in this cozy adventure!

name: A Bibelot: Y-Type
description: Sin descripción

name: Irony
description: You are a nameless mercenary, dispatched to the research facility 'UNDERDOG CORP.' Survive the horrors of this dangerous facility, twisted by human experimentation, and uncover the hidden secrets within before they consume you.

name: Whiskara
description: Whiskara is an action role-playing game where you play as a cat named Lyra. Whiskara also features choice-driven storytelling

name: Sonic Adventure 3
description: Sin descripción

name: The Atlas: Renaissance Voyager
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic The Hedgehog FTS
description: Sin descripción

name: Atomic
description: A fan remake of the game Atmoix for Windows

name: Sonic & Friends 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic & Friends
description: Sin descripción

name: Classic Sonic 3D Adventure
description:
Sonic and Tails take on a new adventure and experience from the norm. In objective to stop Eggman to take control over all the flickies is this unusual world.
Dr. Robotnik latest evil device suck Sonic and Tails to some other dimension taking everything they know with them. As the best option, they have to stop Dr. Robotnik and save all the flickies to bring them back to their original world!

name: Shikanoko Fangame
description: Shikanoko Fangame is a fanmade rhythm game based on the Shikanoko Nokonoko Koshitantan opening theme "Shikairo Days".

name: Aya
description: A Variant of Go for Windows running on the open 'Go Text Protocol' format.

name: A Happy New Year
description:
A Happy New Year is a short text-based game where you spend New Year's Eve alone by the river. It's about getting messages from drunk people, about the need to justify what you're doing and maybe just about ordinary teenage-kitsch, too.

The game mixes personal experiences with fiction and would best be described as a mood-game. It's not necessarily about the story itself, but about a specific feeling at a specific time. It takes about 10 - 15 minutes to complete.

name: Persona 5: Dancing in Starlight - Sonic Suit
description: Costume 'Sonic Suit' for Morgana.

name: Retribution
description:
Retribution is a Half-Life mod made by Chain Studios in 2002.

Tell me honestly, how many sides have you been able to play as in the Half-Life universe? Gordon Freeman (original Half-Life), Adrian Shephard (Opposing Force), Barney Calhoun (Blue Shift), and other less significant characters. In all these games, we often saw a gentleman with a briefcase, in a blue jacket and tie. Who is he, what is his goal? Not a single game gave a definitive clear answer. Now we will finally find out everything, since we play from his point of view: a man named John Bailey.

It turns out that there is a struggle at the top. There are people standing above Bailey on the career ladder, and, as usual, their plans do not include saving the world from evil aliens from the world of Xen. Black Mesa is long overdue for closure - but a certain George Weird, the head of the entire system of scientific complexes, is preventing this. So the G-Man gets a job - a revolver in his pocket and off to look for Weird!

Expand and upgrade your store. Become a true perfectionist and turn this boring space into a stylish home for collectors.

Organize the space - add new features so everyone can find what they are looking for. Open new zones for customers to buy, trade or play in.

Make your store and card collection the best in the world!

description: Alone on a plot of land with a few resources and a single building, your civilization will begin here. Exploit resources, explore and conquer other regions, develop technologies, and fend off relentless barbarian attacks. Everything is manageable: they don't have a dragon!

name: Trainz 2019: SA AN Class - Pacific National
description: The AN Class entered service on Australian National's standard gauge network from Broken Hill to Adelaide, Alice Springs and Perth. In 1995, all were leased to National Rail with the transfer of AN's interstate operations. This pack features two Pacific National livery AN Class locos.

name: Trainz 2019: [TL] Rainsville - Danville
description: This is a fictional map based on American railroads. The train yards were modeled after real-life prototypes from the USA. Among them are Rainville, which is based on Effingham (Illinois), Milford, which is based on Terre Haute (Indiana), and Danville, which is based on Danville (Illinois).

name: Trainz 2019: NSW Bradken 120T Coal Hopper Mega Pack
description: First introduced in 2007 for coal usage across the Hunter Valley. By 2023 over 1000 hoppers had been constructed and are used by various companies. This pack features variants for PN, GWA, ORA, Glencore, Xstrata, and Whitehaven liveries.

name: Trainz 2019: Pro Train: NS Loco Bundle 1
description: Start your railroad journey with Norfolk Southern here. This package delivers all you need to start your railroad business and contains four different locomotives with stunning details.

name: Trainz 2019: BR Class 24 - Blue & Green
description: The British Rail Class 24, also known as the Sulzer Type 2, was a class of diesel locomotives that operated on the British Rail network. A total of 151 units were produced. They had a maximum speed of 75mph, and a power output of 1160 hp, and were nicknamed 'rats' due to their abundance.

name: Trainz 2019: B08 Baggage Car
description: Build by INKA (An Indonesian Train Industries Company) on 2008. This car is running on the Java island of Indonesia. Some of this "Cargo" cars are coupled with the Passenger train service. This content has Animated doors and custom product.

name: Trainz 2019: Pro Train - ATSF F7A/B Warbonnet Loco Bundle
description: The EMD F7 is a model of 1,500-horsepower (1,100 kW) diesel-electric locomotive produced between February 1949 and December 1953 by EMD & GMD. This dlc features the F7A & B in four Santa Fe Warbonnet yellow, red and blue liveries.

name: Trainz 2019: C44aci Locomotive - Xstrata/Glencore Pack
description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed operated by a number of rail freight operators. This pack features Xstrata and Glencore (ex Exstrata) livery units, with custom cab views, full PBR textures, and more.

name: Trainz 2019: RCH 14T Class A/B Tankers
description: RCH 14T Class A/B Tankers were built between 1939 and 1944, and lasted up till the early 1970s. This pack includes 8 variants of the class A and B tankers in the BR era, each with 3 levels of weathering, and animated couplings, handbrakes and brake gear.

name: Trainz 2019: Pro Train - Altoona Works
description: This route features ‘Altoona Works' and it (also known as Altoona Terminal) is a large railroad industrial complex in Altoona, Pennsylvania. 10 new locomotives are included.

name: Trainz 2019: BR General Utility Van Pack 1
description: The General Utility Vans were a series of bogie vans built by British Railways used for transporting parcels mail, vehicle and other goods. These were used over the entire British railways with some still remaining in service with Network Rail. This pack includes Green, Red, Maroon, and Maroon Lined

name: Trainz 2019: Pro Train - CSX Loco Bundle 1
description: Start your CSX railroad experience with these five locos in your shed featuring shunting and long range duties. These detailed locomotives comes with a variety of features like fuel consuming, weathering skins or animated cabin controls.

name: Trainz 2019: Model Trainz - Germany
description: Model Trainz: Germany is a German themed model railway route with several inspirations from different parts of Germany and a few from the classical routes from UTC. The route takes place in the valley of the mountains and in the mountains.

name: Coastal World
description: Coastal World is an immersive 3D web platform that promotes, educates, and informs visitors about digital banking solutions that best fit their lifestyle, values, or specific financial situations through a fun and engaging online experience.

name: Trainz 2019: SA AN Class - Australian National
description: The AN Class entered service on Australian National's standard gauge network from Broken Hill to Adelaide, Alice Springs and Perth. In 1995, all were leased to National Rail, and later were transferred to Pacific National where they were used on a wide variety of trains.
